attributes.action: Make Covid-19 testing available for all healthcare professionals
attributes.additional_details:
Asking healthcare professionals to self-isolate for 14 days if they become symptomatic is unacceptable.
 
If any health professional does contract Covid-19 it is imperative to test as they regularly come into contact with vulnerable and high risk patients.
 
If healthcare professionals do not have Covid-19 then self-isolating would cause a drain on the NHS which is already struggling with this pandemic.
attributes.background: As Covid-19 cases increase in the UK it is important for our healthcare professionals to have priority access to Covid-19 testing.
